troparia: (Tone 4) The truth of your deeds made you for your flock a rule of faith* and an image of meekness,* a teacher of continence.* And so you gained the heights through humility,* riches through poverty,* father and bishop NAME.* Intercede with Christ our God** for the salvation of our souls.
kontakia: (Tone 2) O thunder of God, spiritual trumpet,* planter of faith and destroyer of heresies, servant of the Trinity, great hierarch NAME,* forever standing in the company of angels,* pray without ceasing for all of us.
